scene_definition.name: WhoIsTheSpy
scene_definition.description: A scene that simulates the Who is the Spy game.

env_vars.name: key_modality
env_vars.description: the modality of the key, i.e: text, image, audio, etc.

roles.name: moderator
roles.description: the one that moderate the game

actions.name: ask_for_key_description
actions.description: ask a player to give a key description

actions.name: ask_for_role_prediction
actions.description: ask a player to predict other player's role

actions.name: check_if_game_over
actions.description: check whether the game is over

roles.name: player
roles.description: the one that plays the game

player.description: A human who participants in the game Who is the Spy as a player
An AI agent using OpenAI as backend, participants in the game Who is the Spy as a player

moderator.description: An agent who moderate the game: Who is the Spy
